value.name: Vigil held in Tampa 1 year after man killed in shootout with police
value.description: TAMPA, Fla. (WFLA) – Activists from across Tampa Bay joined together Sunday to remember Jonas Joseph. Tampa police fired more than 100 rounds at Joseph, following a car chase back in April 2020.

value.name: Money and real political will are the only things that will bring justice to Tampa Bay’s Black and brown communities
value.description: Despite recent changes in Tampa Bay’s crisis response systems, local activists with the movement for racial justice say that it’s not just the way that the city responds to crises that needs to change—it’s also the level of investment that’s put into addressing the welfare of Tampa Bay’s Black and brown communities.

value.name: State attorney: Tampa police justified in fatal shooting
value.description: Jonas Joseph, who was suspected in a drive-by shooting five days earlier, opened fire on the officers as he tried to escape around 11:30 p.m. on April 28, police said. They had stopped Joseph to ...
